<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/invites"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

Get all invites either created by your client, or destined for your client.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"description":"Invite","title":"Invite","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"clientId":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the client sending the invite."},"status":{"type":"string","description":"The status of the invite.","enum":["pending","accepted","declined"]}}},{"type":"object","description":"Abstract Invite","properties":{"invitee":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the client that is invited to the space."},"spaceId":{"type":"string","description":"The space for which the client is invited."},"role":{"type":"string","description":"The role the client is invited to hold in the space.","enum":["CodeProvider","DataProvider","DataConsumer","Visitor"]}},"title":"AbstractInvite"},{"type":"object","properties":{"created":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updated":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"responded":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"required":["id","status","invitee","clientId","spaceId","created","updated","responded","role"]}]}}}}},"401":{"description":"User is not authenticated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}},"403":{"description":"Authenticated user does not have access","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
